info.title: SmileIn Management API
info.description: An API for managing items with FastAPI, SQLModel, and SQLite

post.description:
Unified OAuth2 compatible token login endpoint.
Works for both students and instructors.

schema.title: Response Read Admins Endpoint Admins  Get
Response Read Attendances Endpoint Attendances  Get
Response Read Student Attendances Endpoint Attendances Student  Student Schedule Id  Get

get.description: Get a specific course by ID.
Get a specific dataset by ID.

schema.title: Response Read Instructors Endpoint Instructors  Get

get.description: Get a specific instructor by ID.

schema.title: Response Read Notifications Endpoint Notifications  Get

get.description: Get a specific notification by ID.
Get all schedules with optional filters, including course and instructor details.

schema.title: Response Read Schedules Endpoint Schedules  Get

get.description: Get a specific schedule by ID.
Get all student schedules with pagination.

schema.title: Response Read Student Schedules Endpoint Student Schedules  Get

get.description: Get a specific student schedule by ID.

delete.description: Delete a student schedule by ID.

schema.title: Response Read Students Endpoint Students  Get

get.description: Get a specific student by ID (requires authentication)

post.description: Update a student's face recognition data (requires authentication)
Upload a profile picture for a student (requires authentication)
